title: Old, Unrelated Photos Used to Claim Kashmiris Died of Hunger
subtitle: Kashmiris Died of Hunger in Kashmir Viral Photo Fact Check: One of the photos appears to be a funeral of two men, who have supposedly died of starvation, while the other two show wailing women and children.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
One of the photos appears to be a funeral of two men, who have supposedly died of starvation, while the other two show wailing women and children.

The context of the post is the situation in Jammu and Kashmir, following the Centre's move to revoke J&K's special status under Article 370, followed by curfew, lockdowns and other restrictions on the people of Kashmir.

At the time this story was published, the Facebook post had over 2,000 shares.
